name: Obsidian Beast - Rhea
text:
2 Level 3 Flip Monsters
Once per turn during the Standby Phase: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Set 1 "Obsidian Beast'' card from your Deck face-down, and if you set a Trap card with this effect, you can activate it this turn. Once per turn (Quick Effect): If your opponent targets a face-down card(s) with a card effect: You can negate that effect, and if you do, attach that card to this card as material, then change this monster to face-down Defense Position.
